Key Match Events: Tarik Skubal was dominant and Emmanuel Clase was not as the Tigers took game two in Cleveland, 3-0.
Kerry Carpenter pounded a rare hanging slider from Clase into the Progressive Field seats in right field.
Post-Match Reflections: I do not offer this as an excuse but I suspect Clase was struggling to pitch the suddenly colder weather, a concerning development given that it will only get colder from here.
Others: Matthew Boyd and the Guardians bullpen until Clase entered to close out the 8th (by the skin of his teeth and Steven Kwan's glove's leather) was great.
Josh Naylor and Brayan Rocchio were the only Guardians to get hits and Jhonkensy Noel reached on a hit-by-pitch.
